key.name: base-url
key.summary: Base URL of the Uptime Kuma instance
key.description: The base URL (including protocol) of the Uptime Kuma deployment.

key.name: api-mode
key.description: Choose between status-page mode (public JSON), api-key mode (private API), and metrics mode (Prometheus endpoint).

key.name: status-page-slug
key.description: Slug used when constructing the public status page endpoint.

key.name: status-page-endpoint
key.description: Endpoint template appended to the base URL. Use {{slug}} as placeholder.

key.name: status-page-json-url
key.description: Overrides the endpoint template with a full URL.

key.name: api-endpoint
key.description: Relative endpoint used when API key mode is enabled.

key.name: metrics-endpoint
key.description: Relative endpoint that returns Prometheus metrics when metrics mode is enabled.

key.name: refresh-seconds
key.description: Interval in seconds between refreshes. Minimum of 10 seconds.

key.name: show-latency
key.description: Whether latency values should be shown next to each monitor.

key.name: max-items
key.summary: Maximum number of monitors to display
key.description: Limits how many monitors are shown in the popup list.

key.name: appearance
key.description: Chooses between normal and compact indicator layout.

key.name: log-level
key.description: Controls which log messages are emitted.

key.name: demo-mode
key.description: Show mock monitors when no base URL is configured.

key.name: api-key
key.summary: API key for private API access
key.description: API key stored in GSettings (fallback if Secret Service is unavailable). Note: This is less secure than using the Secret Service.

key.name: selected-services
key.description: Array of up to 4 service IDs (as strings) to monitor. If empty, all services are monitored.

key.name: show-text
key.description: Whether to display the status summary text next to the indicator dot in the top bar.

key.name: show-sparkline
key.description: Display a 24-hour status sparkline in the panel indicator and monitor list.

key.name: enable-notifications
key.description: Show desktop notifications when a monitored service goes offline.

key.name: notify-on-recovery
key.description: Show desktop notifications when a service comes back online.
